nav_top: We provide the best services and discounts for you
headerSubtitle: Imkaan is the most reliable choice
homeOffers: Hot offers from us to you
offerDesc: We are not just a taxi company but your reliable travel partner. We provide the best transportation service for our valued customers and loyal drivers.
onlineServiceDesc: Download our app from the App Store or Google Play to use our quality and fast services
clientOpinion: “Imkaan Taxi services exceeded expectations! Payments are convenient and easy, drivers are reliable, and the journey was calm and worry-free. I highly recommend Imkaan Taxi for a safe and comfortable trip. Their customer-first approach is evident!”
withUsDesc: Quality and reliable travel companion wherever you go
longJourney: Your long journey with us in an instant
longJourneyDesc: Relax even on long-distance trips with Imkaan. Start your journeys with memorable comfort and coziness on every traveled road.
taxiServiceDesc: Our experienced drivers will introduce you to the best attractions and hidden corners, making your trip enjoyable and meaningful.
callTime: We are in touch with you 24/7
ourExperienceTitle: We focus on experience and quality
ourExperienceDesc: We enhance your travels with high quality and unforgettable experiences. Your satisfaction is our goal.
modalDesc: Your best taxi choice. Feel reliability and comfort with our high-quality cars and professional drivers. Choose excellence for every journey.
ourTaxiServiceDesc: Enjoy affordable prices on every trip.
exclusiveDesc: Exclusive experience, exclusive travel now at an exclusive price.
vipeDesc: Feel like the most important person with us in VIP.
downloadAppTitle: Your destination is one step away with Imkaan
downloadAppDesc: Imkaan brings travel opportunities to your hands. Download our app now and start a seamless, safe journey. Your travel, your choice – one step closer to you!
serviceTitle: Discover offers tailored just for you.
onlinePaymentDesc: Imkaan's online payment feature transforms your travel experience. No cash hassles—just quick and secure transactions.
safetyDesc: Imkaan prioritizes your health on every journey. Discover a safe and reliable travel experience with us.
fastServiceDesc: We provide you with speed effortlessly. Easy ordering and timely pickup - your quick solution for a hassle-free journey.
priceOfferDesc: Know the service rates to any destination with us in advance.
experiencedDesc: Imkaan guarantees your safety; experience a safe and reliable journey with our tested drivers.
discountDesc: Imkaan delights you with exclusive offers. Enjoy our exciting discounts and promotions on every trip.
customerOptionOne: I tried several taxi apps, and Imkaan is the best. The service is always top-notch, and I like the transparency of prices. It's my first choice for getting around the city!
customerOptionTwo: Imkaan taxi makes my daily commute easier! The app is very convenient, and the drivers are reliable. Every trip with Imkaan is enjoyable and full of adventures.
customerOptionThree: Imkaan stands out with its efficiency. The app interface is intuitive, making it easy to order a car in seconds. Drivers arrive on time, and the cars are clean.
customerOptionFour: Very convenient! Ordering a taxi through Imkaan is very easy. The app is user-friendly, and the arrival time is always accurate. Thank you for making my journey peaceful!
footerTopTitle: Download now and start your next journey with IMKAAN!
aboutImkaanTitle: Reliable and fast taxi service across Uzbekistan
aboutImkaanDesc: Feel the perfect blend of reliability and comfort with us. From the bustling city streets to the quiet outskirts, our reliable cars provide you with a comfortable and peaceful journey across Uzbekistan. Wherever you are, Imkaan is your trusted transportation companion.
orderDesc: With the Imkaan app, you can place an order in a simple and convenient way.
entryOrderDesc: Select one of our services in the Imkaan app and place an order.
driverFindingDesc: Our drivers will be at your specified location at the given time.
enjoyTripDesc: Feel free and enjoy your journey in our comfortable and cozy transports.
serviceFeeDesc: Make payments through our safe and reliable payment systems.
leaderDesc: The leadership of Imkaan taxi is committed to innovation and striving for excellence in the transport sector.
leaderDescTwo: The leader of the Imkaan team aims to significantly improve the quality of internal services in Uzbekistan.
leaderName: Founder & Chief Executive Officer of the Imkaan Team
serviceDesc: Enjoy affordable prices on every journey.
serviceModal: Your best taxi choice. Experience reliability and comfort with our high-quality vehicles and professional drivers. Choose excellence for every ride.
contactUs: If you need help, contact us.
faqDesc: Get answers to questions from many customers and gain more information.
faqTitle: How does Imkaan ensure passenger safety?
faqDescTwo: Imkaan prioritizes passenger safety. To achieve this, it has implemented strict driver screening processes and offers real-time trip tracking. This ensures passengers reach their destination safely and reliably.
faqTitleTwo: How does Imkaan differ from other taxi apps?
faqDescThree: Imkaan stands out with its high-quality services, reliable drivers, transparent pricing, and strong emphasis on safety. Additionally, Imkaan offers users a quick and convenient ordering process, supports all payment methods, and provides flexible tariffs suitable for both long and short-distance trips.
faqTitleThree: How do I apply to become an Imkaan driver?
faqDescFour: To become an Imkaan driver, you can register through the company's official website or app. After registering, you need to submit the required documents and pass a driver qualification check. Once you meet all the requirements, Imkaan will add you to the driver team, and you can start your work.
priceDesc: Prices tailored to your journey. Enjoy transparency and affordability with our flexible tariff options, ensuring you get the most out of every trip.
driverDesc: Dear driver, are you ready to join the Imkaan team? As an Imkaan driver, you not only take the wheel but also join a team of professionals providing excellent service in the vibrant cities of Uzbekistan.
reasonDesc: By becoming a member of Imkaan, you can further increase your income. With a strong customer base and constant taxi requests, you have the opportunity to maximize your earnings as an Imkaan driver.
reasonDescTwo: Imkaan uses modern technologies to simplify and ease your journey. We provide users with convenience, real-time tracking, and affordable prices, allowing you to focus on providing safe and efficient travel.
reasonDescThree: Your safety is our priority. Imkaan operates with strict safety measures for all drivers, including background checks and a 24/7 support team always ready to assist. Drive confidently, knowing you're part of a safe and reliable platform.
reasonDescFour: Imkaan values your loyalty. We offer excellent benefits and rewards to recognize the hard work of our drivers.
reasonDescFive: Start by completing our simple online application. Provide the necessary information, and our team will review your application promptly.
reasonDescSix: Undergo a detailed inspection to ensure your vehicle meets our standards. This step ensures a comfortable and safe journey for our passengers.
reasonDescSeven: Imkaan prioritizes the safety of drivers and passengers. As part of our commitment to safety, we conduct relevant and necessary screenings for all potential drivers.
reasonDescEight: Imkaan provides you with the necessary information and skills to be successful as a driver. From customer service to efficient navigation, our training program prepares you for success.
reasonDescNine: Once you've acquired the necessary skills, you can embark on a journey with Imkaan. Accept orders and further increase your income.
driverComunity: Driver Community of the Imkaan Team:
driverComunityDesc: Join a community of drivers passionate about providing professional service. Imkaan offers you the opportunity to communicate with each other and achieve success.
joinUs: Ready for something better? Join us!
joinUsDesc: Imkaan offers you new experiences and excellent income opportunities in Uzbekistan. Whether you're an experienced driver or new to driving as a profession, Imkaan provides you with the necessary platform to achieve success.
joinDescTwo: Apply now and explore new experiences with Imkaan – every journey is an opportunity, and every driver is a valued member of our growing family.
joinUsDescThree: Imkaan – Turn Every Journey into Success.
contractDesc: Welcome to the Imkaan app! Please read this User Agreement carefully before using our mobile app and related services. By using our app, you agree to comply with this agreement.
contractDescTwo: A. You agree to use the app only for lawful purposes and in a manner that does not infringe the rights of other users.
contractDescThree: B. You are responsible for all information you provide through the application and agree not to submit false or misleading information.
contractDescFour: All rights in the application, including copyrights and trademarks, belong to [Imkaan] or its licensors. Materials obtained from the application may not be copied, reproduced, or otherwise used without prior written permission.
contractDescFive: Imkaan is not responsible for any loss or damage arising from the use of the application. We strive to ensure the continuous availability and reliability of the application but do not guarantee it.
contractDescSix: Imkaan reserves the right to amend these User Terms at any time. We will inform you of any changes by updating the contract text within the application.
contractDescSeven: This agreement is governed by the laws of Uzbekistan, and any disputes related to it are subject to the jurisdiction of the courts of Uzbekistan.
privacyDesc: Welcome to Imkaan! We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, process, and disclose your information when you use our mobile application and related services.
privacyDescTwo: IMKAAN LLC, registered and operating at: 42, Gagarin, Samarkand, Uzbekistan (“Company”), manages the Imkaan mobile application (“Application”). This Privacy Policy outlines the procedure for processing and protecting the personal data of individuals using the Application.
privacyDescThree: By using the Application, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
privacyDescFour: To provide and improve our services, the Company may request personal information from you, such as your name, phone number, email address, and location data. This information is used to identify the user and ensure the quality of the services provided.
privacyDescFive: The application collects and processes geolocation data to perform core service functions, such as finding the nearest transport. Access to geolocation data is required only when using specific features of the Application.
privacyDescSix: In the event of an error in the Application, we collect data from your device (through third parties), referred to as “Log Data.” This includes your IP address, device name, operating system version, the time and date of your use of our service, and other statistical information.
privacyDescSeven: The Company uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience, analyze Application usage, and improve it. You can refuse the use of cookies through your browser settings, but this may limit some functionalities of the Application.
privacyDescEight: We may share your information with third parties to facilitate our services, perform services on our behalf, carry out service-related tasks, or assist us in analyzing how our service is used. These third-party organizations are obligated not to disclose or use your information for other purposes.
privacyDescNine: We do not disclose your personal information to third parties, except when necessary to provide our services or as required by law.
privacyDescTen: The Company takes all necessary measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacyDescEleven: The Company reserves the right to amend this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be announced in the Application. Continuing to use the service constitutes acceptance of these changes.
privacyDescTwel: If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at:
